articles.title: Spacewalking Astronauts Complete Second Roll Out Solar Array Installation on Space Station - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA astronaut Shane Kimbrough and ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Thomas Pesquet concluded their spacewalk at 2:37 p.m. EDT, after 6 hours and 45 minutes. In the ninth spacewalk of the year outside the International Space Station, the two astronauts in…
articles.content:
Spacewalkers (from left) Shane Kimbrough and Thomas Pesquet work to install new roll out solar arrays on the International Space Stations P-6 truss structure on June 16, 2021. Credit: NASA
